main.name: Alek Valencia
main.bio: Full-Stack Engineer with a background in sales and service work and a certificate in Full Stack Development from UCLA Extension. Known as a hard-working, problem-solver that gets along well with others. Have developed applications from scratch as well as refactor code to make applications run smoother and have less load time. Have also completed several group projects implementing API calls from the server and client-side and created a React application from scratch.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to reach out to about any of my projects, hiring purposes, or collaborating.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Created an application for the company with four fellow interns. Self-taught React to complete the project per the company's requirements. Attended weekly sprints to check on progress and address any recommendations from head engineer. Worked directly with the head engineer of the company along with another member of the engineering team.

work.title: Full-Stack Engineer-Freelance
work.description: Helped create server-side API to get zip code. Used asynchronous JS, async/await, fetch, JSON, HTTP GET and POST requests. Helped create a local server to test project prototype and API calls. Helped create validation to determine if the zip code is a valid US zip code with 5 numbers.

testimonials.text: After our initial meeting where the team were tasked with adding a geo-location feature to a project. They checked in with me often to let me know the status and their development process to make sure there werenâ€™t any issues with their plan, which proved him to be a dependable colleague. When the code was delivered, I was impressed to see how well-structured and easy-to-read it was. It also used all ES6 features, which I believe shows them to be quick learners. During our time working together, the team have been very persistent in asking for feedback. I believe this persistence, passion, and curiosity prove that all of them would be a great asset to any team. And with the right guidance and training, I have no doubt they could excel in a higher-level development position.

I have witnessed well organized and effective teamwork geared towards delivering a complex internal product. The team used modern software idioms and an associated stack (React.js, Node.js, Express.js) as well as agile development methods with weekly sprints to iterate over a challenging list of requirements. The team was proactive, responsive, collaborative, and communicative which resulted in deliverables that met our requirements for the project.

...witnessed team growth in technical problem solving, requirements gathering, and general programming ability through the development of a complex web application designed to automate and visualize a specific business process within InsightRx that has been an operational bottleneck for us for quite some time. Not only did the team demonstrate proficiency in widely used technologies (React.js, Node.js, Express.js, etc), they also went above and beyond expectations by deploying the application to the cloud, implementing a production-grade caching service to reduce HTTP overhead, dedicating additional effort to continuously improve the UI/UX, and most importantly, asking thoughtful questions along the way.
